name: Preview-markdown
body:
Install and run ================= Down load package.json, preview-md.coffee and readme.md. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ { .bash .numberLines} $ npm install $ coffee preview-md.coffee readme.md ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Acccess http://localhost:3000.
Edit readme.md,
After save, refleshed borwser.
Usage ====== ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ { .bash .numberLines} bash-3.2$ coffee preview-md.coffee usage: coffee preview-md.coffee [port] ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ TODO ===== * Use radcarpet.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
